text: Waiting to Exhale is a 1995 American romance movie. It came out in December 1995. The cast for the movie includes Angela Bassett and Whitney Houston. The movie is about four women who live in Phoenix, Arizona and their relationships with men. Waiting to Exhale is unusual because it has an all African-American cast. == Other websites == * Category:1995 movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Arizona
title: Waiting to Exhale
